name: Medical service
description: Multinational website for managing prescriptions, the medical route, patient's symptoms. The patients can update their routine, which helps doctor follow their current statuses and give them the helpful advices. Moreover, we provide statistics for medical route, the patient statuses
skills:
React JS, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, redux, styled-component, Webpack, Circle CI, Moment JS, Material UI
Testing Framework: Jest, Enzyme, react-testing-library
Pair Programing, Unit Test, Integration Test

name: Media Management
description: System for managing images, campaigns, and image owners. The librarians or administrators can manage, organize the assets and update the detail information for each asset or bulk update a bunch of assets at a same time. They can publish the assets to some channels such as YouTube, Google Drive, Nuxeo, and other storages by simply clicking one button. Then, all of related information for video could be automatically filled.
skills: React JS, JavaScript, redux, redux-thunk, styled-component, Webpack, Ant Design, common library, ElasticSearch, Nuxeo

name: Stock Exchange
description: A website for trading cryptocurrency. It shows us the latest news managed by admin team. Moreover, There are functions for registered users to exchange and manage the orders, view order history, view coin list and cryptocurrency market.
skills: React JS, Next JS, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Boostrap, Redux, Webpack, Yarn, Web Socket, React-boostrap

name: Management Tool
description: Website for management Agile process. It helps you plan and organize tasks, workflows, and reports for your agile team more efficiently.
skills: Angular 6, Typescript, HTML, Boostrap, SASS, Redux, Webpack, NPM

name: Social Network for Interal Company
description: A free social networking application that allows registered users to create profiles, upload photos, follow people, send messages and donating for friends, followed people,...
skills: React Native, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, styled-component

name: Ticket Management
description: Website for managing (buy and sell) tickets of events which is registered with company. You can view event info, its owner's info and more that relate to event you consider
skills: React Native, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, redux, redux-saga, styled-component, Webpack, NPM

name: Talk App
description: Added advanced donating and messaging features into Application in Android/IOS. The goal of donating features is to allow users who are watching streamers on Android/IOS to donate for streamers by gifts with other values. The goal of messaging features is to notice users some news and to allow users to chat with their friends or follwers.
skills: React Native, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, redux, redux-saga, styled-component, Webpack, NPM
